overview: Beth is not only sweet and loyal, but she is also the brains behind her fianc√© Alex's successful adult website. So, maybe she let herself go a little over the years of slaving over a computer keyboard, love is blind, right? Wrong! Beth is devastated when Alex dumps her for a sexy young model named Claudia. Desperate to win back the affection of her beloved Alex, Beth enlists the help of friends to get back into shape and reinvent herself. Will Alex come to his senses? Or will Beth's transformation attract a more desirable prospect?
tagline: She lost 200 pounds when her husband left
title: Reinvented
